title: Drawing, "Lunch", ca. 1934
inscribed:
Lower right in graphite: "LUNCH"
Upper left in graphite: 1"0" = 5
Upper right in graphite: 5 times as large
Lower left on a diagonal in graphite: 3 1/2 inch pipe (numbers scratched out)
Verso: lower right in graphite: "LUNCH" (inverted)
provenance: Diana Diederich Blake, the artist's daughter
description: Central post topped with a faceted light with letters spelling "LUNCH", topped by an arrow (weathervane) facing left. LUNCH lettered on arrow's tail feathers. Rooster perched on top of arrow with head reaching down to arrow head and tail feathers curling at right. Detail of a lantern at center right.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Lunch", ca. 1934. Graphite. Gift of Diana Diederich Blake. 1992-92-155.
